title: Slow Loop
synopsis: When Hiyori⁠—a young girl whose deceased father taught her the joys of fishing⁠—headed out to sea for some alone time, she never thought that she would encounter another girl there.
staff: [['Akitaya, Noriaki', ['Director']], ['Yamada, Yuka', ['Series Composition']], ['Uchino, Maiko', ['Original Creator']], ['Takimoto, Shouko', ['Character Design', ' Chief Animation Director']]]
